About Me

Mastering human connections through source code

BIO

My ideas and passions have always pushed me further. From working with high voltage powerlines to becoming a self taught software developer. I have enjoyed every challenge life has placed my way. Some of my favorite things to work on are: Machine Learning, iOS development, system architectures, linux systems, and startup ventures. When I am not coding or learning new technologies I enjoy spending time with my kids, riding my bike, traveling, trying new eats and going to cinema. I am most drawn to revolutionary technology, building things, and artificial intelligence.
